Comment: exponential function pow(e, x);(`e` itself not a supported symbol,;but ``exp(1)`` can be used instead)
logarithm of ``a`` with base ``b``;``log(x, e)``;``log(x, e)``;``log(x, 2)``;``log(x, 10)``;(``log(0)`` is defined as ``-inf``);(NOTE: ``log`` without explicit;base is ``ln``, not ``log10``)
The function value is;the ``true_value*`` for the;first ``true`` ``condition*``;or ``false_value`` if all;conditions are ``false``.
Argument types: ``*value*``: all float or all bool;``condition*``: all bool

Comment: minimum / maximum of {a,b};``piecewise(a, a<=b, b)``;``piecewise(a, a>=b, b)``
